pkgmetadata.longdescription: An Interface to the Oxford COVID-19 Government Response Tracker API // The Oxford COVID-19 Government Response Tracker (OxCGRT) tracks and compares worldwide government responses to the COVID-19 pandemic rigorously and consistently. OxCGRT makes available systematic information in a consistent way, aiding those who require information have access to it efficiently for their purposes. This package facilitates access to the OxCGRT data via its API https://covidtracker.bsg.ox.ac.uk/ and includes functions to calculate the various OxCGRT indices in R.
